analysis.key_quote: The proposed regulations, if finalized, would dismantle civil service protections, destabilize the career-workforce, politicize the day-to-day work of government, and erode the very idea of a professional, independent civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about dismantling civil service protections and politicizing government employment, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process rights.
